extDesc.message: Replace specified words with chosen epithets.

div_explanation.message: An extension for Google Chrome that allows you to edit the text of a webpage. Because sometimes you know better.

li1.message: Pin the extension so it's always visible.

li2.message: Select text on the active tab to replace.

li3.message: Click on the extension icon in the toolbar to open the popup menu.

li4.message: Selected text will appear in the popup window's "Find this text:" field.

li5.message: If no text was selected, enter the text you want to replace in the "Find this text:" field.

li6.message: Then enter the replacement text in the "Replace text abve with" field.

li8.message: The active tab will reload and revise the webpage as indicated.

li9.message: This should work on most news websites, and probably won't on social media sites that obfuscate their structure.
